properties.areaDesc: Block Island Sound; Rhode Island Sound
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 11 at 3:42AM EST until January 12 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and
seas 7 to 12 feet expected.

* WHERE...Rhode Island Sound and Block Island Sound.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 3 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 3 PM EST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
